Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the town of Warwick in Orange county to impose a hotel and motel tax; and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
Summary: Authorizes the town of Warwick in Orange county to impose a five percent hotel and motel tax; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the town of Warwick to impose a hotel and motel tax; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
